Conjuration 3

Barathrus Pact

EA, MA Agartha

Summon Units:#495 Earth Elemental
Site Required:#110 Roots of the Earth
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
An Agarthan Oracle ventures down to the Roots of the Earth and seals a pact with Barathrus, the King of Deeper Earth. The Oracle is granted one Earth Elemental that will serve him in the surface world.
